00000.name: Alternate Form
00000.notes: Werewolf. Transformation takes 1 sec. Uncontrollable during the full moon.; Reduced Time; Uncontrollable

00001.name: Animal Empathy
00001.notes: When you meet an animal, the GM rolls against your IQ and tells you what you “feel.” This reveals the beast’s emotional state and whether it is under supernatural control.

00002.name: Bad Reputation 4
00002.notes: Werewolves: Traitor.; People Affected; Recognized sometimes

00005.name: Guilt Complex
00005.notes: You feel responsible for those who play a significant role in your life.

00006.name: High Pain Threshold
00006.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured.

00008.name: Infectious Attack
00008.notes: Anyone you injure must roll 3d. If they roll under the amount of injury, they are infected.

00010.name: Luck
00010.notes: Usable once per hour of play.

00011.name: Lunacy
00011.notes: During the full moon, you are extremely emotional and volatile; on nights of the new moon you are very passive. While the moon is waxing, you are focused and pleasant; while it is waning, you are apathetic and a little touchy.

00014.name: Regeneration
00014.notes: Recover 1 HP per minute. Bane: silver.; Fast; Bane

00020.name: Vulnerability
00020.notes: Silver; Wounding x4.; Silver; Wounding x4

00000.situation: on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun

00001.situation: to initiative rolls for your side (+2 if you are the leader)

00002.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

00004.situation: to all Will and self-control rolls during the full moon

00000.situation: from others aware of your reputation
